blog.name: legacy-of-the-magnum-opus7
blog.title: The Primogenitor of Space and Time
blog.description:
“Every one of us is, in the cosmic perspective, precious. If a human disagrees with you, let him live. In a hundred billion galaxies, you will not find another.” 
― Carl Sagan, Cosmos                                                                                            “To the extreme of this feeling I was ever a victim. The heavy responsibility, often suddenly and unexpectedly imposed—the struggle for success, when success was all but hopeless—the intense anxiety for the arrival of those critical periods which change the character of a malady, and divest it of some of its dangers, or invest it with new ones—the despondence when that period has come only to confirm all the worst symptoms, and shut out every prospect of recovery—and, last of all, that most trying, of all the trying duties of my profession, the breaking to the perhaps unconscious relatives, that my art had failed, my resources were exhausted, in a word, that there was no longer a hope. These things have preyed on me for weeks, for months long, and many”                                                                                       
― John William Polidori, The Vampyre and Other Tales of the Macabre                                                                                                                                                         22 Second Orbit in the Sol System - Our depth is beyond this life - Our flesh is not our own - Our poetry is our catharsis - Our blood ink - We are grateful for each and every individual in this beautiful existence                                          IG:@legacy_of_the_magnum_opus_7

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 // Akira Tribute Cyberpunk 2077 fanart as an AKIRA tribute. As a huge fan of the Akira Movie and Mangas I...
caption:
Cyberpunk 2077 // Akira Tribute

Cyberpunk 2077 fanart as an AKIRA tribute.

As a huge fan of the Akira Movie and Mangas I eventually had to create a fanmade tribute for it, and with the new footage from the trailer and gameplay of Cyberpunk 2077 I saw the opportunity and took it, as I’m extremely hyped for this game.
With this artwork I tried to stay as close to the original Akira poster as possible and I’m really pleased with how it turned out.
Here’s the original for reference: http://bit.ly/2SGgnT6

by  Dominik Figlhuber

summary: So, I got photoshop and I broke it in by drawin some Gays. They’re for Cyberpunk 2020/2077, since I’m hype for Cyberpunk 2077...
caption:
So, I got photoshop and I broke it in by drawin some Gays.
They’re for Cyberpunk 2020/2077, since I’m hype for Cyberpunk 2077 coming out sometime next year.
They’re being their Best Gay Selves, living their Best Gay Lives. I love them.

Boi up front is Koji Maeda - a security advisor working for Arasaka. He’s also trans - with top surgery, but no bottom surgery.

Boi in the back is Leonidas Trakas-Ghuladi (his mother is greek & his father is indian, and they decided to join their surnames rather than have one adopt the other’s), and he works as a med-techie for Trauma Team.

title: Cyberpunk 2077 - Nebenmissionen sind wichtig!
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 – Nebenmissionen sind wichtig!

Neben Red Dead Redemption 2 ist auch Cyberpunk 2077 einer der wichtigsten Titel in der kommenden Zeit. Dabei wird Cyberpunk 2077 endlich etwas einführen nach dem wir uns schon viele Jahre sehnen. Eigentlich hätte man dieses Feature schon lange erwartet und teilweise wurde es auch schon in gewissen Spielen genutzt. Cyberpunkt 2077 wird (more…)

View On WordPress

tags: I just had to give her a little shoutout
everything I know about cyberpunk lore I have learned from her!
title: Interested in Cyberpunk lore?
body:
I highly recommend checking out a YouTube channel called Madqueen Show! She has a shit ton of videos explaining the lore of Cyberpunk 2020 & 2077, and I think she does a great job telling us viewers everything we need to know about the world and its people. The videos also include subtitles.

If you are unsure where to start, this is a good one to begin with.

title: Top 10 Questions About Cyberpunk 2077
body:
Top 10 Questions About Cyberpunk 2077

I know that I wrote in a post that people shouldn’t get aboard the hype train too much because that’s where insane crunch like the 100 hour work weeks at Rockstar comes from, but I can’t help it!  This game has me on the line, and every piece of news that comes out is magic to me.  I’ve watched the 48 minute gameplay demo 1000 times by now.  I hang on every detail.  I could go on about it for…

View On WordPress

summary: Kingdom Hearts 3 is coming? Are you a fan of the series? Stacy and Kami discusses the series as a whole and then talk about what...
body:
Kingdom Hearts 3 is coming? Are you a fan of the series? Stacy and Kami discusses the series as a whole and then talk about what they expect from the sequel. Before they break in that topic, they discuss the games they are playing and bring you some game news. Listen to find out!

Do you like this episode? Wanna complain about something we got wrong? Let us know what you think by dropping a comment below or emailing us at info@templeofgeek.com. We really want to hear your opinions!

Subscribe: iTunes / Google Play / Stitcher

CHECK THIS OUT

  1. Realms Con Official Site
  2. Spider-Man PS4: The 11 Most Fascinating Easter Eggs And Marvel References
  3. Telltale Games is closing, and we may never get to see the end of Clementine’s story

 

ON THIS EPISODE

Hosts – Stacy Bishop & Kami Watkins

SEGMENTS-
Around The Room/What Are You Playing? (01:11)
Game News (13:50)
Parental Controls In Gaming (28:57)

 GALLERY

caption:
Inktober Day 24

Chop
